If you are an initiate it costs only 20 Shards to purchase the Three Fortunes’ blessing. A non-initiate must pay 80 Shards.
Cross off the money and mark Luck
in the Blessings box on your Adventure Sheet.
The blessing works by allowing you to reroll any dice result once. When you use the blessing, cross it off your Adventure Sheet. You can have only one Luck blessing at any one time. Once it is used up, you can return to any branch of the temple of the Three Fortunes to buy a new one. When you are finished here, .
